Detailed Description

ImageCodec specialized in JPEG images.

void JPEGCodec::code (  const DataChunk &    input,
DataChunk *    output,
...   
)  const [virtual]
 

Codes the data in the input chunk and saves the result in the output chunk.

Note:
Has a variable number of arguments, which depend on the codec type.

Implements ImageCodec.

Definition at line 67 of file OgreJPEGCodec.cpp.

References OgreGuard, and OgreUnguard.

Codec::CodecData * JPEGCodec::decode (  const DataChunk &    input,
DataChunk *    output,
...   
)  const [virtual]
 

Codes the data from the input chunk into the output chunk.

Remarks:
The returned CodecData pointer is a pointer to a class that holds information about the decoded buffer. For an image, this would be the size, the bitdepht, etc.
Note:
Has a variable number of arguments, which depend on the codec type.

Implements ImageCodec.

Definition at line 73 of file OgreJPEGCodec.cpp.

References DataChunk::allocate(), Image::BPP2PF(), fill_input_buffer(), DataChunk::getPtr(), DataChunk::getSize(), init_source(), OgreGuard, OgreUnguardRet, skip_input_data(), term_source(), and Ogre::uchar.
